name: SARSLikeSARSRelatedAndMERSCoronavirusPCRQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS like, SARS related and MERS Coronavirus PCR, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to quantitative and qualitative and quantitative detection of nucleic acids within the nucleoprotein (N) gene of SARS-like Coronavirus (SARS-like CoV) in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the nucleoprotein (N) gene of SARS-like Coronavirus (SARS-like CoV) in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
